Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The "SimpleERP" Controller manipulates Model through accessors and mutators. It calls methods from View to provide a representation of Model.
Author:
Raymond Shum

      private boolean employeeSalesHistoryOptionSelection​(java.lang.String input, int employeeID)
      Calls methods corresponding to option entries in the Employee Sales History menu.
      Parameters:
      input - String of user input
      employeeID - target employee whose salesHistory should be displayed
      Returns:
      true (breaks loop) is option to leave menu is selected

    • confirmRemoveSale

      private boolean confirmRemoveSale()
      Calls methods to prompt user for input, confirming whether they wish to remove a sale entry.
      Returns:
      true if "Y", false if "N"

    • removeSale

      public boolean removeSale​(int employeeID)
      Asks user to confirm whether they want to remove a sale associated with a target employee and either removes it or exits method.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - target employee whose sale should be removed
      Returns:
      false if sale cannot be removed, sale does not exist or user decides not to remove sale

    • confirmRemoveSaleID

      private boolean confirmRemoveSaleID​(java.lang.String saleID)
      Asks user to confirm whether they want to remove the sale associated with displayed sale ID.
      Parameters:
      saleID - identifier of sale to be removed
      Returns:
      true if "Y", false if "N"
